content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, I'm impressed by your interest in this prime apartment location, Emilia. However, considering its exceptional features and high demand, I must start the negotiations at 1,200 Euros per month. TERMINATE (if Emilia accepts 1200 Euros) or continue with counteroffers or reasons to not continue if she disagrees.)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
